message.body: Hello my love! Quick question that I'm pretty sure I know the answer to: are you coming to the rehearsal dinner? Dan's mom just wanted me to check since she's trying to round up all the RSVPs and thought she might have sent you one of the invites with a 5
PS I GET TO SEE YOU AGAIN SO SOON
Hey! Yeah I'll be there. What time does it start? When I got the invitation I didn't get an RSVP or anything...I don't think. But I'll be there! Haha I know! So xcited!
Wonderful! Yeah I think there was a phone number or email address to rsvp to. It starts at 630, and the rehearsal starts at 5! Can't wait!!!
Oh sorry!!! Didn't notice - was expecting an RSVP card or something my bad
Haha no worries!!! I mean you were a given anyway... ;-)
